summary_text: Private healthcare majors feel that the Budget has given artificial intelligence (AI) in healthcare a major thrust. Government Healthcare expenditure has doubled over the last 8 years and is going up further. The health ministry has been allocated Rs 89,155 crore, thereby indicating a nominal rise of 12 per cent over the FY23 allocation.

Summari pivots to AI-generated link previews that really click. Summari is set to go live on a major academic publisher and large news site, both unnamed. The company charges a flat fee for access to the tool and then a small usage fee.

OpenAI has announced ChatGPT Plus, a $20 monthly plan that gives you priority access to the AI chatbot, even during peak time. The company also says the plan will give you faster response times andpriority access to new features and improvements. OpenAI says itll be sending out invitations for the service to people who are in the US and on its waitlist over the coming weeks.

ChatGPT Plus will cost $20 per month and offer subscribers a number of additional benefits. The subscription model could be a way for Microsoft Corp., which recently announced a $10 billion investment in ChatGPT, to immediately begin recouping its investment in the AI-unicorn.

The Galaxy S23 Ultra succeeds last years S22 Ultra, which brought with it the essence of both the Galaxy Note and the S phones. The phones primary highlight is the 200MP Adaptive Pixel main camera, which is a first for a Samsung phone. This is accompanied by a 12MP ultra-wide lens, a 10MP telephoto lens with up to 3x optical zoom, and another 10Mp telephoto camera. The phone runs the latest Samsung One UI 5.1 based on Android 13.

India will set up three centres of excellence (COE) for artificial intelligence (AI) at top educational institutions. 100 labs for developing applications using 5G services, the National Data Governance policy for enabling access to anonymised data and the setting up of the DigiLocker solution for centralisation data access.

GIF Remaster is a new camera feature for the Galaxy S23 series. Can improve the quality of animated GIF files, even if they havent been captured/created by the phone owner. Samsung was light on the details of how this will work in practice, but its likely to be available at the touch of a button.

Instagram co-founders Kevin Systrom and Mike Krieger are launching a new social media platform: Artifact. The waitlist for the Android and iOS app opened up on Tuesday. When you open Artifact, you'll see a list of popular articles, and when you click on one that's interesting to you, you will be served more similar posts in the future.

India is expected to have the world's largest workforce by 2030, when more than 60% of our population will be working age. We need to reskill and upskill our current workforce with knowledge for a globalised labour market. The IT services industry faces a huge shortage of talent in domains like robotics, automation, AI, machine learning (ML), data and analytics.

OnsiteIQ raised $10 million to bring AI vision on board so developers can see and record progress. The company's CEO walked Insider through the pitch deck the firm used to raise the funds. According to the National Multifamily Housing Council, 84% of multifamily construction firms experienced job-site delays in the last quarter of 2022.

Allegheny Family Screening Tool (AFST) has received criticism over its opaque algorithms. The Justice Dept. has filed formal complaints regarding the program. The AFST is designed to help social workers determine which families require further investigation regarding child welfare claims. Critics argue the programs potentially faulty judgments could influence the employees decisions.

Douglas Insights has a complete report based on cloud-based contact centers, which is very detailed, providing the readers with relevant information. The report analyzes today's market trends by serving 2020 as the base year and predicts future ones till 2026. Some of the most famous vendors that provide the client with cloud contact centers are Talkdesk, RingCentral, Nice and Genesys.

The scheme will emphasize on On-job training, industry partnership, and alignment of courses with needs of industry. The scheme will also cover new age courses for Industry 4.0 like coding, AI, robotics, mechatronics, IOT, 3D printing, drones, and soft skills.

1 Upload a photo2 Tell AI what you want to wearThe sky is the limit!Launched on October 1st, 2015. Available on iOS and Android devices, with plans to expand to other platforms in the future. For more information, visit the company's website or go to the official website.

Samsung's Galaxy S23 Ultra is the flagship phone to beat this year. It has a 200MP primary camera sensor, almost a two times increase from the S22. The front-facing camera has been upgraded to a 12MP sensor, and now records in super HDR and 4K/60fps. Samsung claims the new Galaxy series offers the best mobile gaming experience.

Chat GPT is a language-processing AI model that is capable of generating human-like text, such as essays. It was launched by San Francisco company OpenAI in late November. But with the rise of AI comes inevitable risks. Deepfake software allows people to swap faces, voices and other characteristics. It has been used to create phoney pornographic films involving real-life celebrities.

Pittsburgh-based child welfare agency uses the Allegheny Family Screening Tool. The tool helps social workers determine which families need to be investigated based on that familys risk level. The U.S. Justice Department and other critics expressed concern that by utilizing the AI tool, the data collected can enforce discrimination against low-income families.

OpenAI has launched its first subscription plan for its ChatGPT AI chatbot. The $20-a-month service will give users priority access to new features and improvements. The move comes just weeks after the company announced a multi-billion dollar partnership with Microsoft.

The world will cross the global warming threshold of 1.5 degrees Celsius within 10 to 15 years. If emissions remain high over the next few decades, the study predicts a one-in-two chance that Earth will become 2 degrees Celsius hotter on average. The research employed AI to predict climate change using recent temperature observations from around the world.

ChatGPT, an AI text generator, can be anything the user makes of it. It can take on the role of a chef and provide recipes, make business plans for marketers, create press releases for public relations specialists or give advice like a therapist. Its public release has raised concerns about plagiarism, prompting one top French university to ban the use of ChatGPT.

South Korean electronics maker Samsung on Wednesday announced three flagship smartphones in the Galaxy S23 series at its first Unpacked event of 2023. Leading the pack is the Samsung Galaxy S 23 Ultra which brings a 200 megapixel based camera system loaded with several industry first features. The smartphone gets enhanced lsquoNight Photosrsquo with a new adaptive pixel 200MP sensor.

Galaxy S23 Ultra, S23+ and Galaxy S23 will hit the stores' shelves on February 17, 2023. New devices come in four colours  Phantom Black, Cream, Green and Lavender. Samsung reported nearly 70 per cent decline in quarterly profit to $3.5 billion due to weak global economy.

The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra boasts the most advanced camera system of the Samsung smartphone lineup. The new phone offers an AI-powered feature that corrects these errors, resulting in a clear and precise photo. The Expert RAW App gives users DSLR-level shooting capability, so you can have photographer-level pictures taken from your handheld device.

Samsung unveils Galaxy S23 Ultra, S23+ and S23 Plus smartphones globally. Galaxy Book3 series, its latest flagship PC lineup, also unveiled. Prices for the premium smartphones and laptops will be announced soon. India availability will also be revealed at a later date.

Digs, slang for home, was founded last year by Ryan Fink, co-founder and CEO. The company raised a $7M seed round led by Fuse and Flying Fish. This digital twin of your Digs becomes a platform for the builder, vendors and suppliers, and is eventually handed off to the homeowner.

ChatGPT is an advanced language model developed by OpenAI. It can understand and generate human-like responses to a wide range of topics. The chatbot can be used as a handy little internet search engine. A $42 monthly paid professional "experimental" package is now available from Open AI.

NASA and IBM have launched a new collaboration to utilize Artificial Intelligence. The project will seek to extract a greater understanding of the patterns and likely projections to be made from the data. One of the proposed joint projects will train an IBM geospatial intelligence foundation model on NASA's Harmonized Landsat Sentinel-2 dataset.

As a train driver in Germany during World War II, it is likely that your trains carried a variety of passengers, including troops, supplies, and possibly even civilians. The exact makeup of your train's passengers would depend on the specific route you were driving and the needs of the war effort at the time. The conditions on the trains would have been crowded and uncomfortable, with many passengers packed into each car.

AI brains in robots could manifest in physical robotic bodies. Nanobots could power themselves from chemicals in a liquid mixture. Necrobotics, the science of using dead spiders in robotics ventures, saw a huge advancement last year when researchers found deceased spiders had the perfect grip for robotic use.

U.S. President Joe Biden hopes to help the two allies compete against China on military equipment, semiconductors, and artificial intelligence. Biden and his Indian counterpart Ajit Doval met with senior officials from both countries in Washington to launch the U.S.-India Initiative on Critical and Emerging Technologies.

Facebook now has 2 billion daily active users, Meta reported alongside its fourth-quarter earnings. The report marks the first time Facebook, which added 16 million users last quarter, has reached 2 billiondaily users. While Metas revenue has shrunk over the last year, the companys $32.2 billion in revenue for the last quarter of 2022 was still slightly better than expected.

Nvidias next-generation Deep Learning Super Sampling 3 (DLSS 3) technology now supports Cyberpunk 2077. The game has a mode called Psycho Mode for its ray-traced lighting settings, which Nvidia says will create a visually stunning gaming experience. Nvidia has invested billions of dollars extra in real silicon and software to support these two functions.

ChatGPT was launched in November 2022, but has already become a household name. The AI can write an essay or a novel based on a short prompt. It can be used to formulate responses for customer service centres, create marketing material and even write press releases. But there is one practical problem with ChatGPT - its knowledge is static.

Sunflower Bank has launched a new small-business lending platform in partnership with SmartBiz. Small Business Administration (SBA) 7(a) and Express Line loan products will be available beginning in the second quarter of 2023. Sunflower Bank is based in Denver, Colorado and has branches in El Paso and Las Cruces, New Mexico.

Versus Systems (VS) stock is skyrocketing today on important news. The company has announced a partnership with Resolve Debt. The two innovators will bring artificial intelligence (AI) to the payment industry. VS stock has the potential to rise well above penny stock range if the company is able to successfully secure a piece of the personal finance market.

Warhammer 40k Henry Cavill series looms on the horizon. Former Superman star is attached to a project to create films and TV. GW do not expect to sign on the line for the licensing deal this financial year, partly because they want to ensure the deal does no harm to the Warhammer 40k IP.

The advanced stages of the ICT programs in St. Vincent and the Grenadines will include Artificial Intelligence. This is according to the Ambassador to the Republic of China, Sha Li-Lan. These programs are especially important following the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic.

The tool will flag content written by OpenAI's products as well as other AI authoring software. It will be available as a web app, along with some resources for teachers. The popularity of ChatGPT has given rise to authorship concerns as students and workers use the bot to create reports and content.

Promaxo, Inc. announced five Promaxo systems sold in the month of January 2023, for a total of 30 MRIs and approximately $18.3 million in sales achieved since the Companys commercial launch in the fourth quarter of 2021. System sales were made to physician practices, ambulatory surgery centers (ASC), and integrated delivery network (IDN) facilities.

Nvidia's next-generation Deep Learning Super Sampling 3 (DLSS 3) technology now supports one of the most popular and most demanding AAA video games, Cyberpunk 2077. The game has a mode called "Psycho mode" in the ray tracing lighting settings that creates a visually stunning gaming experience.

C3.ai (NASDAQ:AI) traded up 6.1% on Wednesday. The stock had previously closed at $19.85. Approximately 12,711,968 shares changed hands during mid-day trading, an increase of 80% from the average daily volume of 7,061,599 shares.

The Budget envisions a technology driven and knowledge based economy with strong finances. Some of the focus areas to achieve this are artificial intelligence AI adopting open source software and opportunities from the 5G internet. The government plans to deploy digital solutions in all its seven priority areas mdash.

Artificial intelligence (AI) or computers that imitate human intelligence in performing tasks already has a growing presence in several industries. expanding adoption of AI could fuel a 14% boost in gross domestic product in North America by 2030. The downside for humans in the workplace will include loss of interest and loss of expertise.

Google is testing a new artificial intelligence chatbot similar to ChatGPT. The chatbot is a product from San Fransisco-based startup OpenAI, which developed the technology in collaboration with Microsoft. One Google executive described the impending AI efforts as "make or break" for Google's future.

Storm in a Cup has announced its latest project, Steel Seed. The game is set to be released in 2024 for PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC. It will blend action-adventure and stealth into one package, with the trailer giving off vibes eerily reminiscent of Nier: Automata.

ChatGPT released a new classifier tool to detect AI-generated text that, within a few hours, proved to be imperfect, at best. The tool reported that it was unclear whether the books preface was written by AI; but the foreword was possibly AI and a paragraph from the first chapter was likely AI.

ChatGPT can write computer code to program applications and software. It can check human coders' language for errors and convert ideas from plain English into programming language. ChatGPT's abilities translate well to the legal profession, according to AI experts as well as legal professionals. The way companies buy ad space will become automated "in a highly effective way" within five years.

The tech is called Metaphysic Live, and we might have Americas Got Talent to thank for it. Hollywood took notice when during a 2022 AGT performance, a photorealistic avatar of Elvis sang on stage. Zemeckis said in a statement: With Here, the film simply wouldnt work without our actors seamlessly transforming into younger versions of themselves.

AI has been growing to unprecedented levels, but experts have ethical concerns. The ethics behind AI-generated art are hotly debated in the art community, especially in terms of copyright law. Many artists believe art-generating AI will lead to human artists being even more undervalued than previously.
